title: Post Artifact Response
description: Response to a request for posting an artifact. Note that the `kind` property is referenced in the request as well.

oneOf.title: S3 Artifact Response
oneOf.description: Response to a request for a signed PUT URL that will allow you to upload an artifact to an S3 bucket managed by the queue.

kind.description: Artifact post response kind, in this case `'s3'`

putUrl.description: URL to which a `PUT` request can be made to upload the artifact requested. Note, the `Content-Length` must be specified correctly, and the `ContentType` header must be set the value specified below.

expires.description: Date-time after which the signed `putUrl` no longer works

contentType.description: Artifact mime-type, must be specified as header when uploading with the signed `putUrl`.

oneOf.title: Azure Artifact Response
oneOf.description: Response to a request for an Azure Shared Access Signature (SAS) that will allow you to upload an artifact to an Azure blob storage container managed by the queue.

kind.description: Artifact post response kind, in this case `azure`

expires.description: Date-time after which Shared Access Signature (SAS) will seize to work.

contentType.description: Artifact mime-type, should be specified with the `x-ms-blob-content-type` when committing the block.

putUrl.description: Shared Access Signature (SAS) with write permissions, see [Azure REST API](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-US/library/azure/dn140256.aspx) reference for details on how to use this.

oneOf.title: Redirect Artifact Response
oneOf.description: Response to a request for the queue to redirect to a URL for a given artifact.

kind.description: Artifact post response kind, in this case `redirect`

oneOf.title: Error Artifact Response
oneOf.description: Response to a request for the queue to reply `403` (forbidden) with `reason` and `message` to any `GET` request for this artifact.

kind.description: Artifact post response kind, in this case `error`
